title: Italian sausage with broccoli and white beans
directions: Heat oil in small nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add broccoli, sausage, and onion; cover and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is almost tender, about 7 minutes.

Add garlic; toss. Add beans, water, and a pinch salt (optional); cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is tender and beans are hot, about 1 minute. Sprinkle with Parmesan and pepper flakes.
ingredients: 2C broccoli florets, cut in bite-size pieces
3 oz cooked chicken sausage(s)Italian variety, or turkey sausage, thickly sliced; 3 points
1/2 C canned cannellini beans, rinsed, drained
